mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, ow.order_wasted_phone AS orderWastedPhone, ow.order_wasted_address AS orderWastedAddress, ow.order_wasted_amount AS orderWastedAmount, ow.order_wasted_date AS orderWastedDate, owd.order_wasted_delivery_status AS orderWastedDeliveryStatus FROM order_wasted_delivery owd INNER JOIN order_wasted ow ON owd.order_wasted_idx = ow.order_wasted_idx INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = owd.company_info_idx ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_wasted_confirm( order_wasted_idx, username, company_info_idx, order_wasted_confirm_status, order_wasted_confirm_content, admin_username, order_wasted_confirm_date )VALUES(#{orderWastedIdx},#{userName},#{companyInfoIdx},#{orderWastedConfirmStatus},#{orderWastedConfirmContent},#{adminUsername},now());
mapper.select: SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, ow.username AS userName, ow.order_wasted_phone AS orderWastedPhone, ow.order_wasted_address AS orderWastedAddress, ow.order_wasted_amount AS orderWastedAmount, ow.order_wasted_date AS orderWastedDate, COALESCE(owc.order_wasted_confirm_status, '대기중') AS orderWastedConfirmStatus FROM order_wasted ow INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ow.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx LEFT JOIN order_wasted_confirm owc ON ow.order_wasted_idx = owc.order_wasted_idx;

SELECT ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, ow.username AS userName, ow.order_wasted_phone AS orderWastedPhone, ow.order_wasted_address AS orderWastedAddress, ow.order_wasted_amount AS orderWastedAmount, ow.order_wasted_date AS orderWastedDate, ow.order_wasted_idx AS orderWastedIdx, ci.company_info_idx AS companyInfoIdx, COALESCE(owc.order_wasted_confirm_status, '대기중') AS orderWastedConfirmStatus FROM order_wasted ow INNER JOIN company_info ci ON ow.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx LEFT JOIN order_wasted_confirm owc ON ow.order_wasted_idx = owc.order_wasted_idx WHERE owc.order_wasted_confirm_status IS NULL;
